snippet: The official transcript of the Declaration of Independence may contain an errant period that contributes to what one scholar calls a “routine but serious misunderstanding” of the document.
abstract: Princeton scholar Danielle Allen is asserting that official transcript of Declaration of Independence produced by National Archives and Records Administration contains a significant error; contends that an errant period not found on original parchment contributes to what she calls a 'routine but serious misunderstanding' of the document; other scholars who have reviewed Allen's research say she raises a serious question.
lead_paragraph: The official transcript of the Declaration of Independence may contain an errant period that contributes to what one scholar calls a “routine but serious misunderstanding” of the document.
